Please be aware that these maps are illustrative and not intended to be used for navigation. They do not indicate public access nor any hazards or dangers.

Beyond the Estate

The Wentworth family were tremendously wealthy, and owned property across the country. They were also prolific builders of follies and monuments, and their name is associated with many roads and buildings, particularly around Barnsley.

To learn about those buildings associated with the Wentworth family, but which lay outside of the estate, click here.
